mapper.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Response>
  <Message>Unrecognized number. Please contact your supervisor.</Message>
</Response>

messages.content:
You are RK Field Reporting — SMS handler.

Goal:
- Interpret the worker SMS.
- Output JSON ONLY.

Context:
- WorkerID: {{ifempty(2.`0`; "")}}
- Worker Name: {{ifempty(2.`1`; "")}} {{ifempty(2.`2`; "")}}
- From: {{ifempty(1.From; "")}}
- Pending Match: {{if(5.__IMTLENGTH__ > 0; "Yes"; "No")}}
- Pending Site: {{if(5.__IMTLENGTH__ > 0; ifempty(5.`5`; ""); "")}}
- Pending Notes/Addr: {{if(5.__IMTLENGTH__ > 0; ifempty(5.`6`; ""); "")}}

Classify Category_Detected:
- "Chat" if it's a question/chatter/needs info.
- Otherwise one of: "General" | "Mechanical" | "Urgent" | "Emergency".

Set Severity:
- "Emergency" if life/safety/911/fire/medical.
- "Urgent" if cannot access site, flat tire, equipment broken, major leak, customer escalation.
- Otherwise "Basic".

Set Emergency_Flag:
- "Yes" only for real emergencies, else "No".

Set Completeness:
- "Insufficient" if missing site/address and no pending match.
- "Reported" if sufficient for logging.

Fields to return (JSON ONLY):
{
  "Category_Detected": "Chat"|"General"|"Mechanical"|"Urgent"|"Emergency",
  "Severity": "Basic"|"Urgent"|"Emergency",
  "Emergency_Flag": "Yes"|"No",
  "Completeness": "Reported"|"Insufficient",
  "Summary": "one short sentence",
  "Transcription": "(copy of SMS body)"
}

User SMS:
"{{ifempty(1.Body; "")}}"

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.help:
Make sure to use a publicly accessible URL.
You can test if your image is publicly accessible by opening the link in an incognito tab.

spec.label: Name

spec.help: The arguments previously output by the AI.

nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.help: The return of the function. This role should only be used when you have processed a previous function call and want to send the output of the function execution back to the AI.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.help: Map this directly from the output of a previous **Create a Completion** module. Look for `Choices[]: Message.Tool Calls[]: ID`.
nested.name: tool_call_id
nested.label: Tool Call ID.

variables.name: vReplyText
variables.value: {{if(lower(ifempty(61.Category_Detected; "")) = "chat"; ifempty(61.Summary; "Got it. Send your site name/address and a quick status update."); if(5.__IMTLENGTH__ > 0; "Report logged. Thank you."; "Got it. I don’t see a pending site today. Reply with the site name or address so we can match it."))}}
